resources.string: \tThis application can be used to login in to UoM Wireless wi-fi connection without entering username and pasword again and again. When you connect to UoM Wireless wi-fi, app will automatically log you in.\n Feel free to let me know if you have any problems or suggestions.
1).\tTap the settings button at bottom left corner.
4).\tFinally tap the login button at the bottom right corner.
If you are using a Huawei phone, follow these steps.
\tIf this application does not run on background, try adding this app to protected apps list in your settings.\n \tIf you are using a Huawei GR5 2017 (Nougat) model then follow the steps below."
Step 1).\tGo to Settings and Click Apps
Step 5).\tList All apps and click on UoM Wireless application
Step 6).\tCheck Allow option and hit OK
